result.title: Digital repository for carbon & environmental models, methods & tools
result.description: Deliverable 5.1 consist in a digital repository for carbon and environmental models, methods and tools used and implemented in EU for climate change mitigation and adaptation. The repository will span across the entire agricultural sector, covering agriculture-related environmental footprint parameters in relation to climate smart agriculture.
